screens/WalletNavigator.You are about to generate a new set of r: 您正進行產生新的恢復字組，確認要繼續？

screens/DexScreen.Pick a pool pair below, supply liquidity: 為以下去中心化交易所配對池提供流動資金，並獲得高利率的區塊獎勵回報.
screens/DexScreen.Supply liquidity pool tokens to earn hig: 您可以向流動池提供資金已賺取區塊獎勵和兌換佣金

screens/DexGuidelines.Participate in supplying liquidity to po: 將您的貨幣提供給 DEX 去中心化交易所，並獲得高達三位數百分比的年回報率
screens/DexGuidelines.Withdraw at any time: 隨時能從流動性池中取出貨幣
screens/DexGuidelines.Earn high yields by supplying token pair: 提供流動池配對貨幣並獲得高回報率
screens/DexGuidelines.Conveniently swap participating tokens w: 方便地在流動池裡兌換貨幣

screens/ReceiveScreen.Use QR or Wallet Address to receive any: 請用 QR 碼或地址接收遞飛鏈 DST 或 DFI

screens/SendScreen.Authorize transaction in the next screen: 在下一個屏幕上授權交易以進行轉換

screens/ConvertScreen.Scan recipient QR: 掃一掃 QR 二維條碼

screens/ConvertScreen.Review full transaction details in the n: 請在下一步確認交易明細

screens/CommunityScreen.DeFiChain is a community-driven and open: 遞飛鏈 DeFiChain 是個社區優先、開源項目
screens/CommunityScreen.The DeFiChain Foundation does not provid: 此項目是完全去中心化的，並沒有提供客服

screens/Settings.You will need to use your recovery words: 請留意，您下次回道錢包時需要恢復字組

screens/Settings.You are about to change your language to: 您正要切換至 {{language}} . 確認並繼續
screens/Settings.Auto-locks wallet if there is no activit: 錢包如静止超過 1 分鐘，會自動上鎖。

screens/AboutScreen.Participate with active community: 參與活躍的遞飛鏈社區
screens/AboutScreen.Report in Github, discuss in Reddit and: 在 GitHub提交反饋、電報群和其他社區提問討論
screens/AboutScreen.Track transactions, tokens and DEX pairs: 審查交易、代幣、和去中心化配對
screens/AboutScreen.Learn more about the blockchain: 了解更多關於遞飛鏈區塊鏈和相關資訊

components/LoansFaq.The decentralized loan feature allows yo: 去中心化的貸款功能可讓您使用您擁有的加密貨幣持有量作為抵押品，並貸款去中心化的代幣。當您想啟動貸款功能，您必須先在鏈上創建一個金庫，並在貸款前存入抵押品。
components/LoansFaq.How is the collateralization ratio calcu: 金庫抵押率是如何計算的？
components/LoansFaq.The collateralization ratio is calculate: 抵押率的計算方法是將存入金庫的抵押品總價值；除以貸款金額加上總利息，以百分比表示。
components/LoansFaq.What is the collateralization ratio used: 金庫抵押率的用途是什麼？
components/LoansFaq.The collateralization ratio determines t: 抵押率將決定金庫的狀態。比率低於最低抵押率會導致清算，此時，金庫的抵押品將直接送去拍賣。
components/LoansFaq.Indicators have been included to help vi: 顏色指示顯示出您的金庫目前的健康狀況，其中若是：
components/LoansFaq.Red: 1x – 1.25x above the minimum collat: 紅色視為警告：目前處在最低抵押率的1.25倍~1.5倍
components/LoansFaq.Yellow: 1.25x – 1.5x the minimum collate: 黃色視為注意： 目前處在最低抵押率的1.25倍~1.5倍
components/LoansFaq.Green: More than 1.5x the minimum collat: 綠色視為正常：目前處在超過1.5倍的最低抵押率
components/LoansFaq.What does the different status of a vaul: 金庫的不同狀態表示什麼？
components/LoansFaq.Active: When a vault has been created bu: 活躍：當某金庫已被創建，但還沒有獲得貸款時
components/LoansFaq.At risk: When the collateralization rati: 處於風險中：當某金庫的抵押率在1倍-1.5倍之間，高於最低抵押率時
components/LoansFaq.Healthy: When the collateralization rati: 健康正常：當某金庫的抵押率超過最低抵押率的1.5倍時
components/LoansFaq.Liquidated: When a vault's collateraliza: 已清算：當一個金庫的抵押率低於最低要求時
components/LoansFaq.Halted: When any token in the vault (col: 停止：當金庫中的任何代幣（抵押品或貸款）在過去一小時內波動超過30%時
components/LoansFaq.How are interests calculated for loan?: 貸款的利息是如何計算的？
components/LoansFaq.There are 2 types of interests that appl: 貸款利息有兩種，分別為金庫利率和代幣利率
components/LoansFaq.The vault interest rate is determine whe: 金庫利率是在金庫所有者選擇金庫方案時確定的，最低抵押率越高，金庫利率越低。
components/LoansFaq.The token interest rate is applied on sp: 代幣利率適用於特定的代幣貸款，不同的代幣會有不同的利率。
components/LoansFaq.The total interest rate applied on a loa: 總利率是由：由金庫利率和代幣利率整體以每年率計算。

screens/TransactionsScreen.Start transacting with your wallet. All: 您能開始從錢包做交易. 所有 UTXO 交易都會在這裡顯示.目前還不提供其他交易類型.

screens/TokensVsUtxoScreen.DFI exists in two forms – UTXO and token: DFI 有兩種形式 - UTXO 和代幣, 兩者可依據使用做互換. 這個程序可以進行互換.
screens/TokensVsUtxoScreen.UTXO DFI is the main form DFI and is use: UTXO DFI 是 DFI 的主要形式，用來做接收、發送、費用和其他加密貨幣功能. DFI 代幣適用於 DeFi 功能如兌換或流動性挖礦.
screens/TokensVsUtxoScreen.Your DFI balance includes both UTXO and: 您的 DFI 總資金含 UTXO 和代幣形式

screens/OnboardingCarousel.Nobody owns your keys and wallet except: 除了您之外沒有任何人能控制您的私鑰.
screens/OnboardingCarousel.Transact, liquidity mine, swap and many: 雙方交易、流動性挖礦、兌換和其他去中心化錢包功能.
screens/OnboardingCarousel.Earn high yields: 本項目從未做任何融資，
screens/OnboardingCarousel.of up to 90% with DEX: 以先來先得的社區參與方式收穫，目前高回報率高達 90%
screens/OnboardingCarousel.Supply liquidity to BTC, ETH, and many o: 為流動性池提供 BTC、ETH和其他流動池配對，並獲得區塊獎勵. 您可以隨時取出獎勵！

screens/CreateMnemonicWallet.If you leave this screen, you will be pr: 如果您離開此頁，您會產生新的24字恢復字組. 確認要繼續？
screens/CreateMnemonicWallet.Take note of the words in their correct: 請注意每個字的正確順序排列

screens/Guidelines.Before you create a wallet, you will see: 在創建錢包錢，螢幕會顯示您的 24個字的恢復字組，請確保保管好這些字組.
screens/Guidelines.Learn more about recovery words: 了解更多關於「恢復字組」
screens/Guidelines.I understand it is my responsibility to: 我了解保管好我的恢復字組是我的個人責任，也了解當丟失了之後是無法還原錢包，造成可能性的資金損失.
screens/Guidelines.Take note of their correct spelling and: 注意每個字的順序排列和拼字
建議使用線下，不在光線下或潮濕的地方.
screens/Guidelines.Don’t share to anyone. Keep the recovery: 不要將這恢復字組讓別人知道

screens/GuidelinesRecoveryWords.Your unique 24 recovery words is a human: 您獨特的24個恢復字代表可讀的錢包私鑰，是由BIP-39標準中的2048個字列表生成.
screens/GuidelinesRecoveryWords.You will need your recovery words to res: 您需要使用恢復字組在新的手機上恢復錢包，可以把這個關聯想像成您的錢包和資金的鑰匙.
screens/GuidelinesRecoveryWords.If you lose your recovery words, you wil: 如果您丟失字組，您就不能恢復錢包，也會丟失錢包所有資料和資金.
screens/GuidelinesRecoveryWords.It is important that you write down your: 請注意：記下恢復字組和字組排列是非常重要的.請保管好，避免他人能看到，放在一個防潮濕、防水火、或任何對字組有害的環境

screens/PinConfirmation.It may take a few seconds to securely en: 需要一些時間進行錢包加密
screens/PinConfirmation.Your wallet was unlinked for your safety: 您輸入了多次錯誤的密碼，為了安全，目前錢包已解開鏈接. 請用恢復自組以還原和重設錢包.
screens/PinConfirmation.Last attempt or your wallet will be unli: 最後一次可輸入密碼，為了安全，如果不通過，您的錢包會解開鏈接
screens/PinConfirmation.Incorrect passcode. {{attemptsRemaining}: 密碼錯誤. 您還剩 {{attemptsRemaining}} 次可輸入密碼

screens/PinCreation.Well done! Your wallet is created. Keep: 恭喜您創建新錢包！接著請創建密碼以維持安全保護.
screens/PinCreation.Well done! Your wallet is restored. Keep: 恭喜您恢復錢包！接著請創建密碼以維持安全保護.

screens/VerifyMnemonicWallet.Invalid selection. Please ensure you hav: 選擇的字組錯誤. 請確認您已經寫下正確的字和順序.
接下來要確認您寫下正確的字組.
screens/VerifyMnemonicWallet.What is word: 這個號碼對上的字是什麼

screens/RestoreWallet.You have unsaved changes. Are you sure t: 您有未儲存的更改. 您確認您要捨棄更改？
screens/RestoreWallet.The recovery words you have entered are: 您輸入的恢復字組並不完全正確. 請再次確認並重試.
screens/RestoreWallet.Please provide your 24 recovery words to: 請輸入您的24字恢復字組.
screens/RestoreWallet.Uppercase, numbers and special character: 不允許使用大寫字母、數字和特殊字符

screens/ErrorBoundary.The app ran into a problem and could not: 此程序出了一些問題，關掉後請重新啟動程序.

screens/ConnectionBoundary.There seems to be a problem with the con: 網絡連接不良，請查看網絡設定後重試.

screens/FeatureFlagScreen.This feature is still in Beta, upon acti: 此功能仍處於Beta測試版 階段，使用它可能有些風險。您是否想繼續？
screens/FeatureFlagScreen.Beta feature(s) of Light Wallet represen: 輕錢包的Beta版功能是在正式發布前正在進行最後測試的功能。我們鼓勵您對這些功能進行測試，但建議在使用您的資產時要謹慎。
screens/FeatureFlagScreen.Feature is still in Beta. Use at your ow: 功能仍處於測試階段。使用時風險請自己負責。

screens/UnlockWallet.Please enter passcode to securely sign y: 請輸入密碼以安全地簽下您的交易

screens/TransactionAuthorization.Please wait while your transaction is be: 請稍候，您的交易正在準備中

您正要切換至 {{network}}，確認並繼續？

components/RecoveryWordFaq.What happens if I lose my recovery words: 如果我遺失了恢復字組會怎樣？
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Once you lose your recovery words, you w: 如果遺失恢復字組, 使用者將無法恢復錢包及所儲存的資產。建議使用者必須好好保管及存放。
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Can I use the 24-words from xxx that I c: 如果我的24單詞是透過 xxx 產生，可以使用嗎？
components/RecoveryWordFaq.You can only reuse the 24-words only if:
如何你的24單詞是透過 Jellyfish 生態產生的， 你可以重新使用24單詞。

兼容客戶端包括 DeFiChain 錢包 (安卓或蘋果iOS系統)，及 DFX.SWISS (安卓或蘋果iOS系統)。

但是，我們非常不鼓勵你重複使用它，你的24單詞的安全性僅與生成它的源始計算機/設備/應用程式保證一樣安全。否則的話，24單詞的安全性是不獲確認的。最重要的是每台計算機/設備/應用程式配置獨立一套的24單詞。
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Can someone help me if I lose my recover: 如果我遺失了恢復字組可以求助於別人嗎？
components/RecoveryWordFaq.No. You have sole access to your recover: 不建議。個人的24個單詞是不應該透露給任可人。除了自己，沒有人有責任和義務給你保管。
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Why is it recommended to keep my recover: 為何建議用離線方式或紙張來紀錄保存 24個單詞？
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Storing it in digital networks could mak: 儲存24單詞在數字網絡會有較高的機會給駭客入侵及盗取。最理想的是用紙張記錄和保存。
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Your unique 24 recovery words is a human: 你的連續顯示24個英文單詞是指儲存在錢包的private key，它由2048個單字所產生的，支持BIP-39 標準的錢包。就算整個硬體錢包被盗或入侵，仍然可以確保安全的。

components/PasscodeFaq.Your six-digit numeric code passcode, se: Your six-digit numeric code passcode, set by you, would be use to authorize all transactions. Keep your passcode private and secure. You are responsible for your own security.
components/PasscodeFaq.What happens if I forgot my passcode? Ca: What happens if I forgot my passcode?
components/PasscodeFaq.Your passcode is your responsibility, he: Your passcode is your responsibility, hence no one, aside from you, knows it. It is important that you keep your passcode safe and change it from time to time.
components/PasscodeFaq.Yes, you can change your passcode from y: Yes, you can change your passcode from your settings in-app. We recommend changing of passcode regularly for maximum security.
components/PasscodeFaq.Is passcode the same as phone PIN code?: Is passcode the same as phone PIN code?
components/PasscodeFaq.Your passcode is valid only for DeFiChai: Your passcode is valid only for DeFiChain wallet.

components/ReservedDFIInfoText.A small UTXO amount (0.1 DFI) is reserve: 需要預留一些可使用的 UTXO (0.1 DFI) 作為費用

components/ConversionInfoText.Conversion will be required. Your passco: 將需要轉換。您需要以 App 密碼授權兌換交易。
components/ConversionInfoText.Please wait as we convert tokens for you: 正在為您的交易轉換代幣，請稍候。轉換過程是不可逆轉的。

components/ConversionBreakdown.Amount above are prior to transaction: 以上金額為交易前的金額

components/InfoTextLink.Learn more about UTXO and Token: 了解 UTXO 和代幣區別
components/InfoTextLink.Learn more about vaults: 了解更多關於金庫的資訊

components/EmptyVault.To get started, create a vault and add D: 若要啟動貸款，您需要創建一個金庫，並添加DFI和其他幣作為抵押品

screens/CreateVaultScreen.Choose loan scheme for your vault: 為您的金庫選擇貸款方案
screens/CreateVaultScreen.This sets the minimum collateral ratio a: 這將設置了最低抵押率和金庫的利率.
screens/CreateVaultScreen.Keep note of your selected collateral ra: 請注意您為金庫選擇的抵押品比率，以維持持續貸款
screens/CreateVaultScreen.Confirm your vault details in next scree: 在下一個屏幕上確認您的金庫細節

screens/ConfirmCreateVaultScreen.ID will generate once vault has been cre: 金庫創建後會產生金庫 ID
screens/ConfirmCreateVaultScreen.Creating vault with min. collateral rati: 創建金庫時，設定的最低抵押率為{{amount}}%，利率為{{ir}}%年回報率

components/FeeInfoRow.Each transaction will be subject to a sm: 每筆交易需要支付少量的費用. 金額可能因網絡擁擠程度而異.
components/FeeInfoRow.This fee serves as initial deposit for y: 這筆費用作為您金庫的初始押金。當您選擇關閉這個金庫時，您會收回 1 DFI。

您的金庫已被鎖定以進行清算.
screens/VaultDetailScreen.Your vault is at risk of liquidation. Pr: 您的金庫狀態可能會被清算。為了確保金庫能持續運作，請增加抵押品資金或立即還完貸款。
使用此金庫需要抵押品.

components/EmptyActiveLoans.Browse for available loan tokens and sta: 瀏覽可選擇的貸款代幣並開始使用此金庫作為抵押.

components/EmptyBalances.Get started by adding your tokens here i: 在您的錢包中添加代幣便可以開始操作

screens/EditCollateralScreen.COLLATERALS WILL BE ADDED TO VAULT: 您正要向金庫添加抵押資金
screens/EditCollateralScreen.ADD DFI AND TOKENS FOR COLLATERAL: 添加DFI和代幣作為抵押資金
screens/EditCollateralScreen.Each token has their own collateral fact: 每個代幣都有不同的抵押品價值因素.
screens/EditCollateralScreen.Vault needs DFI to be in 50% vault share: DFI抵押資金需要佔金庫的50%
screens/EditCollateralScreen.Confirm details in next screen: 在下一個屏幕中確認細節
screens/EditCollateralScreen.Are you sure you want to remove collater: 您確定您要移除抵押品代幣嗎?

screens/ConfirmEditCollateralScreen.You are adding collaterals to: 您正要向以下金庫添加抵押資金
